prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: A beautiful young woman with an ethereal and intelligent appearance, standing full-body on a pure white background, centered. Impressionist oil painting style with rich chiaroscuro and visible brushstrokes.

Her face is exquisitely beautiful with delicate, harmonious features. She has a fair, luminous complexion that seems to glow with a soft inner light, like moonlight on porcelain. Her eyes are large, almond-shaped, and a striking, clear silver color, radiating profound wisdom, gentle compassion, and immense charisma. They hold a knowing, serene gaze. Her eyebrows are finely arched. Her nose is slender and straight. Her lips are full, softly curved in a gentle, compassionate smile. Her expression is serene, kind, and carries an air of quiet intelligence and noble grace.

Her hair is long, flowing down past her waist like a cascade of liquid moonlight. It is a silvery-white color with subtle, shimmering highlights reminiscent of moonbeams. The style is elegant and natural, with soft waves, and a few delicate strands frame her face.

She wears a flowing, ethereal gown that embodies the theme of the moon and its children. The dress is in shades of silvery-white, pale blue, and soft lavender, reminiscent of the night sky and moonlit clouds. The fabric appears light and diaphanous, like gossamer or fine silk, with layers that create a sense of movement and depth. Delicate, intricate patterns resembling celestial constellations, crescent moons, and swirling nebulae are subtly woven into the fabric with shimmering silver and iridescent threads. The gown has a high collar and long, billowing sleeves. The overall silhouette is graceful and regal, suggesting both her divine heritage and her physical prowess.

Her overall demeanor is one of serene elegance, immense inner strength, and captivating beauty, fitting perfectly into the poetic, beautiful fantasy world of moonlight. She appears as the last direct descendant of the Moon Goddess, a beacon of hope and connection.

Full-body character design, pure white background, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

back.prompt:
Generate a full-body, back-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. No facial features should be visible.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

side.prompt:
Generate a full-body, side-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Facing left. Standing with arms relaxed at sides.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
